articles.author: The Tribune India
articles.title: Out now, Sidhu Moosewala's most-awaited song SYL is all about Punjab rivers and Sikh prisoners
articles.description: Sidhu Moosewala’s first song posthumously, SYL has been released on his YouTube channel. The song is written, sung and composed by the late singer himself. It is produced by MXRCI and the video and artworks are done by Navkaran Brar.
articles.content:
Tribune Web Desk
Chandigarh, June 23

articles.author: TN National Desk
articles.title: Bypolls 2022: Lowest voter turnout in Punjab's Sangrur; 76.6% in Tripura
articles.description: The three Lok Sabha seats that went to polls are Azamgarh and Rampur in Uttar Pradesh, and Sangrur in Punjab. The seven assembly seats are Rajinder Nagar in Delhi, Mandar in Jharkhand, Atmakur in Andhra Pradesh and Agartala, Town Bordowali, Surma and Jabarajn…
articles.content: Bypolls 2022: Polling began in Uttar Pradeshs Azamgarh and Rampur Lok Sabha seats, which are considered as the bastions of the Opposition Samajwadi Party (SP) in the state. (Image: Twitter/@ANI)
